items.title: The Simple $1,000,000 Problem No One Can Solve
items.author: Veritasium
items.summary: Veritasium explores a complex mathematical problem that has remained unsolved for decades, delving into its implications and the challenges it presents to mathematicians.

items.title: The Physics Behind Tom Brady's Football Spiral and Its Misconceptions
items.author: Veritasium
items.summary: This analysis reveals that even Tom Brady's throws are not perfect spirals but include a slight wobble and curve essential for optimal flight. The spin stabilizes the football in flight, reducing drag and increasing accuracy, which is a fundamental but often misunderstood principle crucial for players and fans alike.
